name: The Funny Farm
description:
Welcome to The Funny Farm

The funny farm is a home for mentally unstable farm animals. It's where farmers send their stressed out animals to relax.

These animals LOVE their routines. Each day new animals arrive at the farm. Arrange them on the board so that they may all go about their days uninterrupted.

You DO NOT want to find out what happens when one of their routines gets interrupted...

Good luck!
